ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Lesser Shielding is a level 8 spell. -Solric ... From: Vincent Archer [mailto:Vincent.Archer@hsc.fr] Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 2:34 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Lesser Shielding is a level 8 spell.

-Solric


-----Original Message-----
From: Vincent Archer [mailto:Vincent.Archer@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 2:34 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Level 12 spells


From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

According to Mathieu Guillaume:
> From: Mathieu Guillaume <mat@...>
> I'd say Lesser Shielding, which is an upgrade over Minor Shielding.
>
> On Mon, 10 May 1999, Gregory Egan wrote:
> > Could I elicit opinions as to what is the next best spell to get after
> > Shock of Lightning and Bind Affinity? Thanks for any advice.

In practice, I'd say Lesser Shielding comes *before* Bind Affinity. Affinity
is nice, since at that level, your feet start to itch a lot, but never
underestimate your protection first. That can save you your life (and thus a
lot of XP).

You can always find someone to bind you if you lack it. You cannot have
someone
else cast the Shielding on you (other buffs yes. But not that one).

--
